column1: Welcome to LYNKS! This Privacy Policy explains how we collect
column3: and protect information from users of our Android application.

column1: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
To process and fulfill orders placed through our application.
To communicate with users regarding their orders
To analyze user behavior and feedback to enhance the functionality and user experience of our application.
We take reasonable measures to secure the information collected and prevent unauthorized access or disclosure.
Object to the processing of their data.
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Users will be notified of any significant changes.
If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy
